alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 2:00PM CDT until June 12 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Shelby County in eastern Texas... Northeastern San Augustine County in eastern Texas... Northwestern Sabine County in eastern Texas... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Center to near Converse, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milam, San Augustine, Zwolle, Patroon, Shelbyville, Bland Lake, Neuville, Huxley, Noble, Hurstown, Sexton, Calgary, Jericho, Toledo Bend Reservoir North and Jordans Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
